title: ►NO FEE◄  STUNNING NEW RENOVATION 3 bed, 2 bath
posting_body: Be the first to live in a beautifully renovated 3 bed 2 bath first floor apartment on Ashford St.  New bathrooms and kitchen with stainless appliances and quartz countertops.
New central AC/heating plus full size in-unit laundry.
Close to everything - shops, restaurants, bars and public transportation.
It's a short distance away from BU West, Packard's Corner (Packard's Corner B-line T-stop, Super 88 Market, 24 hr.
Star Market), #57 bus (Oak Square, Kenmore, Watertown Yard), #66 bus (Harvard Sq) and Allston center.
Contractors are still busy working on the apartment with pictures coming soon.
